stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Cash Advance Laws in Largo, Florida
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Largo are protected by Florida's comprehensive payday lending regulations, administered by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation's Division of Consumer Finance. Largo residents benefit from some of the nation's strongest consumer protections against predatory lending practices.
keyPoints: All payday lenders in Largo must be licensed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation
You can only have one payday loan at a time in Florida, enforced by statewide database
Single-payment loans are capped at $500 with maximum 10% fee plus $5 verification fee
Installment loans are capped at $1,000 with maximum 8% biweekly fee on outstanding balance
You must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another
Loan rollovers and extensions are prohibited by law
If you can't pay on time, you're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling
You cannot be criminally prosecuted for an unpaid payday loan
Prepayment penalties are prohibited - you can pay off early without extra cost
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal or financial advice. Payday loan laws and regulations are subject to change. For the most accurate and up-to-date information about Florida payday loan regulations, please contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit flofr.gov. Consult with a licensed financial advisor or attorney regarding your specific situation before making borrowing decisions.

nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Largo location? We also serve these nearby cities:

faq.question: Where is your Largo cash advance location?
faq.answer: Our Largo branch is located at 434 Forest Hills Drive, Suite 130, right near beautiful Largo Central Park and Pinewood Cultural Park. We're easy to access from US-19.

faq.question: What are your hours at the Largo location?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturday 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. We're closed on Sundays. No appointment needed!

faq.question: Is Largo a good city to live in?
faq.answer: Yes! Largo is known for its great parks, safe neighborhoods, and community activities. Central Park is especially beautiful. Many families and retirees choose to live in Largo.

faq.question: Can I use my Heritage Village membership as ID?
faq.answer: Heritage Village passes can help verify your identity, but you'll need a government-issued ID (driver's license, passport, etc.) for the application. We're happy to work with you on the documentation you have.

faq.question: What's the fastest way to get approved in Largo?
faq.answer: Apply online first to save time, then visit our location with your documents (ID, proof of income, checking account information). Most customers complete the entire process in 15-30 minutes.
